about_the_game:
Gypsy Retro TV is a media player designed to enthrall the viewer with a unique experience of watching a movie in the wilderness. The viewer is bound to be enchanted by the flora and fauna present in the ecosystem.

In Gypsy Retro TV, the viewer watches the movie in the company of his/her pet and can play a movie from his PC in an exclusive and open area, away from the hustle and bustle of the town. Added to reel show within the TV, are real life animations in the form of wild animals, amphibians and insects, put in motion in the background, and they are bound to mesmerize the viewer.

While watching the movie, one enjoys the breeze of the natural atmosphere and the food cooking in the vicinity, kindles the taste buds and boosts energy.

The overall experience is vastly enticing and the desire to repeat the play in Gypsy Retro TV remains unquenched.

Supported formats : mp4, mov, avi, mkv, wmv, m4v, webm, flv, vob, ogg, mpg, 3gp

name: Gypsy Retro TV Media Player

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Gypsy Retro TV Media Player

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7 64 BIT or WINDOWS 10 64 BIT
  • Processor: i5 2400 @ 3.1GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS 7 64 BIT or WINDOWS 10 64 BIT
  • Processor: i7 4770K @ 3.5 GHZ
  • Memory: 24 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Gypsy Retro TV Media Player as its name suggests offers an experience of viewing any movie in the TV frame of the bygone era. To enthuse the viewers, an environment of wilderness, with flora and fauna is present. The viewer is reminded of the glories of the good old days and nostalgia is aroused.
